### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5) and pipe at position(x=-16.5, y=25.5)

### Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0), boiler at position(x=1.5, y=3.0), and multiple pipes connected to them

### Pipe network at position(x=1.5, y=-6.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to each other, forming a pipe group with fluid system 165325

### Pipe network at position(x=3.5, y=-2.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to each other, forming a pipe group with fluid system 165335

### Pipe network at position(x=-16.5, y=25.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to each other, forming a pipe group with fluid system 165372

### Electricity network at id=16545
Consists of multiple small electric poles connected to each other, forming an electricity group

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are not blocked by other entities or terrain before attempting to connect them
- Check that the entities are compatible with each other and can be connected

### Errors when rotating entities
- Make sure that the entity can be rotated in the desired direction before attempting to rotate it
- Check that the entity is not blocked by other entities or terrain

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the tile is empty and not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity
- Check that the entity can be placed at the desired position and direction

### Errors due to nil values
- Check that all required values are not nil before attempting to use them
- Ensure that all entities and connections are properly initialized before attempting to use them
